price: Do you not see how your Lord extends the shade? If He had willed, He could have made it still. Then We made the sun an indication of it[24].
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيۡفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنٗا ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلشَّمۡسَ عَلَيۡهِ دَلِيلٗا
footnotes: [24] i.e., indication for its existence or making it apparent.
